meanings.definition: The process of creating images using electricity and light.
meanings.sent1: Electrophotographies involve using electricity and light to make pictures.
meanings.sent2: I learned about electrophotographies in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The artist's electrophotographies were so bright, they lit up the room!
meanings.sent4: Her electrophotographies were like capturing lightning in a bottle.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of electrophotographies is in the fusion of technology and art.

meanings.definition: The resulting images produced through electrophotography.
meanings.sent1: The gallery displayed stunning electrophotographies from the latest exhibition.
meanings.sent2: I was amazed by the clarity of the electrophotographies in the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The electrophotographies on the wall seemed to come alive with a flicker of light.
meanings.sent4: His electrophotographies captured moments in time like frozen sparks.
meanings.sent5: The electrophotographies on display showcased the power of technology in art.
